description.narrative: FMO intends to fund this investment as part of this strategic effort to reach its own GHG goals while realising an acceptable risk-return level. It has been well documented that investing in (commercial) forestry and forestry related activities contributes significantly - and most efficiently - to the GHG targets. Also, forestry generates more than average (rural) employment than other productive industries.

participating-org.narrative: Ministry of Foreign Affairs of the Netherlands

description.narrative: FMO intends to fund this investment as part of this strategic effort to reach its own GHG goals while realising an acceptable risk-return level. provider-org.narrative: Ministry of Foreign Affairs of the Netherlands

description.narrative: An activity that contains sub-activities (sub-components) which are reported separately to IATI
